name: Scarlet Thread
description:
Scarlet Thread is a deck building game , you could build up your deck with your own card and fight with other players at rank game.
Players could build up your deck with Hero cards, Equipments , Spells and Followers.In the action phase, both sides will deploy cards simultaneously, deploying them in different areas. After the turn ends, the cards of both sides will automatically fight. Players who win in different areas will receive more resources or cause damage to the enemy.
We also provide a PVE mode based on the same battle structure.You could start up with a random deck or build your own deck for your own journey.
PVE mode would generate dungeons randomly, so you will always facing unknown dungeons.
Onece you finish the PVE fight , you could get more cards which you could build into your deck.
